column5: Help please, my family is hooked on popcorn to the level that for Mothers Day my kids bought a high end popcorn maker and know I have been given the task to find them this popcorn.  Have been searching but all that I can find is ether small bags and or crazy shipping costs, any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.  Thank you,  FLEX
A quick google search lead me to several listings on Amazon.  I've never had an issue ordering with Amazon.  G

I have never even heard of it before now. I did grow my own popcorn one year and it turned out fantastic, easy to do and might be fun for the family. Other than that Sue just buys the white pop corn from the bulk food store.
I'm off to a local Amish bulk foods store. If I find some, I'll pm you  I wonder what the international shipping cost would be?  We will see
